title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Security Hub: Unifying & simplifying security operations at scale (SEC228)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS Security Hub：大规模统一和简化安全运营 (SEC228)
abstract: AWS Security Hub is your unified security solution that helps prioritize and respond to critical security risks at scale. We'll explore how Security Hub correlates security signals across multiple sources and demonstrates enhanced visibility around these signals. Discover our new capabilities that simplify operations, and see how leading organizations like Awesome (SmugMug and Flickr) are using automated correlation, prioritization, and response to streamline their security operations. This session will showcase practical strategies for maximizing Security Hub's capabilities at scale
abstract_cn: AWS Security Hub 是您的统一安全解决方案，可帮助您大规模地确定关键安全风险的优先级并做出响应。我们将探讨 Security Hub 如何关联多个来源的安全信号，并展示围绕这些信号的增强可见性。了解我们简化操作的新功能，并了解 Awesome（SmugMug 和 Flickr）等领先组织如何使用自动化关联、优先级排序和响应来简化其安全运营。本次会议将展示大规模最大化 Security Hub 功能的实用策略
